families.name: SidecarTridge Multi-Device Family
families.description: Firmware builds for A multi-device emulator on Raspberry Pi Pico steroids for the Atari ST, STE, and Mega series computers.

firmwares.name: Multidevice First Generation (1G) Full
firmwares.description: The first generation of the SidecarTridge Multi-Device cartridge firmware.
firmwares.post_install_html: Unplug the device and plug it to your computer to complete the installation.

firmwares.name: Multidevice First Generation (1G) Debug
firmwares.description: The debug build of the first generation SidecarTridge Multi-Device cartridge firmware.
firmwares.post_install_html: Unplug the device and plug it to your computer to complete the installation.

families.name: SidecarTridge TOS Emulator Family
families.description: Firmware builds for SidecarTridge TOS Emulator board for the Atari ST, STE, and Mega series computers.

firmwares.name: TOS Emulator rev3 boards for Atari STE and Mega STE (256KB)
firmwares.description: Full 256KB firmware for SidecarTridge TOS Emulator v3 revision boards for Atari STE and Mega STE computers.
firmwares.post_install_html: Unplug the device and plug it to your computer to complete the installation.

firmwares.name: TOS Emulator rev3 boards for Atari ST and Mega ST (192KB)
firmwares.description: Full 192KB firmware for SidecarTridge TOS Emulator v3 revision boards for Atari ST and Mega ST computers.
firmwares.post_install_html: Unplug the device and plug it to your computer to complete the installation.

firmwares.name: TOS Emulator rev3 boards upgrade for all Atari models
firmwares.description: Upgrade firmware for SidecarTridge TOS Emulator v3 revision boards for all Atari ST, STE, and Mega series computers.
firmwares.post_install_html: Unplug the device and plug it to your computer to complete the installation.

families.name: SidecarTridge Kickstart Emulator Family
